name: ThirstyNight Chapter II. BETA
description:
ThirstyNight is a story game in which our protagonist is in an endless loop. The goal is to get out of the room and drink a glass of water.
Unfortunately, only the demo version of the game is ready.

This game is designed for browsers.
 [Player]  Come! Try this game and get different endings! [Story] You will not regret it!
